Name: Aha
Subject: Isiokwu
If you have any query, please contact us: Ọ bụrụ na inwere ajụjụ, biko kpọtụrụ anyị
When Farmers Connect, Communities Prospe: Mgbe ndị ọrụ ugbo jikọtara, obodo na-eto
into Shared Success: n'ime ihe ịga nke ọma ọnụ
We connect crop farmers, herders, and fi: Anyị na-ejikọta ndị ọrụ ugbo, ndị na-azụ anụ, na ndị na-azụ azụ na nduzi, ezigbo ihe onwunwe, na ọnụ ahịa ziri ezi n’asụsụ mpaghara, ọbụlagodi na-enweghị intaneti.
We know farming is hard work. Whether yo: Anyị maara na ọrụ ugbo siri ike. Ma ị na-akụ ahịhịa, na-ele anụ, ma ọ bụ na-akụ azụ, ị kwesịrị inweta ezigbo ego maka mbọ gị.
Many farmers work alone. Middlemen take: Ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ ugbo na-arụ ọrụ ha naanị. Ndị etiti na-ewe uru. Okwu na-egbochi ohere. Ndị ọrụ ugbo dị mma na-arịọ enyemaka ebe ndị ọzọ na-enweta ihe ọma.
That's why we built BubeTech. We connect: N’ihi nke a ka anyị jiri wuo BubeTech. Anyị na-ejikọta onye ọrụ ugbo ọ bụla - site n'ọtụtụ obere ugbo ruo n'ọgbọ anụ ndị buru ibu - na ihe ọmụma, ihe eji arụ ọrụ dị mma, na ọnụahịa ziri ezi ha chọrọ iji ruo ihe ọma. Ekwentị gị aghọla enyi ọrụ ugbo gị. Olu gị dị mkpa. Ụmụ mmadụ gị na-eme ka obodo gị sie ike.
Farm smarter, live better. When farmers: Rụọ ugbo n'ụzọ amamihe, bie ndụ ka mma. Mgbe ndị ọrụ ugbo jikọtara, mmadụ niile na-erite uru.
Helping Farmers Adapt, Grow, and Succeed: Inye aka ka ndị ọrụ ugbo gbanwee, too, ma rie uru site n’ụzọ e kwekọrọ.
Why Choose Bubetech: Gịnị mere ị ga-eji họrọ Bubetech?
Get current market prices and know the t: Nweta ọnụ ahịa ugbu a ma mata uru eziokwu nke ihe ubi gị, anụ ụlọ na azụ.
Get advice from agricultural experts and: Nweta ndụmọdụ site n'aka ndị amamihe n’ọhịa na ndị ọrụ ugbo nwere ahụmịhe.
Get help in your local language through: Nweta enyemaka n'asụsụ gị site n'aka oku olu, SMS, ma ọ bụ ngwa ekwentị. Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ma inwere internet ma ọ bụ na ịnweghị.
Find quality resources like seeds, grazi: Chọta akụrụngwa dị mma dị ka mkpụrụ, ebe ịkụ anụ, ebe ịkụ azụ na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ. Jikọọ na ndị ọrụ ugbo ọzọ ka e kesaa akụrụngwa.
Do I need a smartphone to use BubeTech?: Achọrọ m ekwentị smart iji BubeTech?
How do I register for BubeTech?: Kedu ka m ga-esi debanye aha na BubeTech?
Why does BubeTech start with pastoralist: Gịnị mere BubeTech ji bido na ndị na-azụ anụ?
Why work through associations instead of: Gịnị mere unu ji na-arụ ọrụ site na òtù karịa ịrụ ọrụ ozugbo na ndị ọrụ ugbo?
Contact us for current pricing. The more: Kpọọ anyị maka ọnụ ahịa ugbu a. Ka ndị ọrụ ugbo dị n'obodo gị na-esonye, otú ahụ ka ọnụ ahịa ga-adị mma nye onye ọ bụla.
No! BubeTech works on any phone - basic: Mba! BubeTech na-arụ ọrụ na ekwentị ọ bụla - ekwentị nkịtị, ekwentị smart, ma ọ bụ ekwentị nwere ụfọdụ atụmatụ. Ndị ntorobịa ndị nnọchite anya na-eme ndebanye aha site na ngwa anyị.
Wait for youth ambassadors from your ass: Chere ndị ntorobịa ndị nnọchite anya si n'òtù gị ka ha bịa n'ógbè gị. Ha ga-edebanye aha gị site na ngwa anyị ma nyere gị aka inweta kaadị njirimara dijitalụ gị.
We speak Fulfulde, Hausa, Yoruba, Igbo,: Anyị na-asụ Fulfulde, Hausa, Yoruba, Igbo, Bekee, French, Portuguese, na ọtụtụ asụsụ ndị West Africa ọzọ.
Pastoralists face the most challenging i: Ndị na-azụ anụ na-eche ihe ike nkewapụ kacha sie ike ma nwee usoro nhazi ọha mmadụ siri ike nke na-eme ka mmejuputa iwu dị mma. Ihe ịga nke ọma ebe a na-ewulite ntọala maka ije ozi obodo niile na-arụ ọrụ ugbo.
Associations have established trust and: Òtù ndị ahụ eguzobela ntụkwasị obi ma marakwa ndị so na ha nke ọma. Anyị na-eme ka òtù ndị ahụ sie ike ka ha nwee ike inye ndị ọrụ ugbo uru dị mkpa ebe ha na-asọpụrụ usoro obodo omenala.
